meanings.definition: An association or combination of companies for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The local consortium of businesses organized a charity event.
meanings.sent2: The consortium of tech companies collaborated on a new project.
meanings.sent3: The consortium of bakers decided to have a doughnut-eating contest.
meanings.sent4: The consortium of stars in the night sky shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The consortium of ants worked together to carry a large crumb.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals or companies working together.
meanings.sent1: Our school formed a consortium to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The consortium of artists displayed their paintings at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The consortium of friends planned a surprise party for Sarah.
meanings.sent4: The consortium of colors in the painting blended harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The consortium of bees buzzed around the hive busily.
